body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Foster Automotive! My name is Philip Foster. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Philip, I'm Michelle Parker. Nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you too, Michelle! How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a billing issue with my recent service. The amount charged seems incorrect.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Michelle. To assist you further, could you please provide me with your phone number and email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two. And my email address is michelle.parker@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Michelle. I'll look into the billing matter and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Philip. I appreciate your help. I'm already starting to feel relieved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. Your satisfaction is our priority. Thank you for reaching out to Foster Automotive. Have a great day!
